summary.span: 定義 和 兩個類別通用的處置行為。

span.span: Defines disposal behavior that is common to both the and classes.

summary.span: 支援 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 基礎結構，但並不適合直接透過您的程式碼使用。

span.span: supports the Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 類別內命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱命名空間。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.

Protected Overrides Sub InternalDispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所衍生之類別正在使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the class that is derived from and optionally releases the managed resources.
